title: gdbinit
extract: .gdbinit allows running specific commands which comes in existing once gdb is executed. For example: Following command once specified in .gdbinit which will show assembly in Intel format. set disassembly-flavor intel. Also gdb macros can be defined as per custom needed. Here is sample .gdbinit.
extract_html: .gdbinit allows running specific commands which comes in existing once gdb is executed. For example: Following command once specified in .gdbinit which will show assembly in Intel format. set disassembly-flavor intel. Also gdb macros can be defined as per custom needed. Here is sample .gdbinit.
